game.name: Basketball Brick Breaking
game.description:
We have brought to you a new type of basketball game where you can have fun and entertainment in a different style. Here you do not have to score the goal. But, your command on how beautifully you can break the brick will set you a winner of this arcade puzzle. Do you want to try it out? Join Basketball Brick Breaking game and be prepared to destroy all bricks you see on the top of the screen! You should definitely try it out no matter whether you like basketball or brick. 

Make sure to catch the basketball with the help of your brick in this latest sports challenge. Click the screen to launch your basketball and get ready to keep moving your mouse to catch the ball when it reaches the bottom after breaking the bricks placed on the top! Try to be focused and play wisely as you would have only 3 lives to use! You would clear the level when you finish all the bricks. Take a break and explore this fun game when you get tired!

This html5 arcade game is based on the basketball theme. Keep your ball alive until you clear all of the bricks from the screen in each level! Do your best and play like a champion in all 18 levels in this one of the best physics-based games for kids! Do not forget to grab power ups to improve your score and complete each level fast! Good luck to become a champion of basketball in our other popular titles of sports games, no download required on atmegame.com!

game.mobileControlKeys: SWIPE TO MOVE THE SOLID OBJECT TO JUMP THE BALL
game.webControlKeys: MOVE THE SOLID OBJECT BY MOUSE TO JUMP THE BALL
